Package activity

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AllTopicPageActivity
    An activity which will Load and show all top-level comments to the user from the Internet(with 5 different sorting options),it also allow user to publish a new top level comment, view a comment, and provide the access to the local comment which stored as favorites or indicated comment and logout option.
    CommentPageActivity
    An Activity which display a specific Comment's Content, which allows user choose to edit, read/sort browse replies, add a reply, add Comment as favorite, add Comment as indicated comment.
    CreateCommentPageActivity
    An Activity which provide user option to create/reply a Comment with a location if GPS is enabled, attach a picture to the Comment or cancel the publish.
    EditCommentPageActivity
    An Activity which will load an existing comment and provide the Comment author option to edit the Comment and update it on the server.
    FavoritePageActivity
    An activity which will Load and show all comments which has been marked as favorite or indicated Comment to the user from the shared preferences (with 5 different sorting options) in a ListView, user is able to view a comment, and provide the access to the local comment which stored as favorites or indicated comment.
    LocalCommentPageActivity
    An Activity will display the content of a locally cached Comment to the user with the option to sort the Comment replies.
    LoginViewActivity
    An Activity provides user to login in to the Application.
    OtherProfilePageActivity
    An Activity allows user to view Comment author's profile (if it exists).
    ProfilePageActivity
    An Activity which allows user to reset user name, add/edit his profile to the server.
